title: Durant Is Staying in Brooklyn â€¦ for Now. Plus, Things We Think We Know About the 2022-23 Season.
description:
Justin Verrier and J. Kyle Mann start by discussing how good the Nets can be now that Kevin Durant is staying in Brooklyn (3:17). Then, they talk about a few things they think they know heading into the 2022-23 season (26:58).

Hosts: Justin Verrier and J. Kyle Mann
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
